title: >>> Can ANYBODY Stop Him?
body_text:
It's about one man, Joe Kelly.
At DODGEBALL 38, Joe planted the seeds for what would the most awesome, the most destructive run in the history of dodgeball. His perfect record of 3-0 proves that when it comes time to forming an army, he does it better than anyone. There have certainly been other successful captains in the game of dodgeball, but no one has achieved a record of consecutive wins like Joe has.
This leaves a question unanswered:
Who will be Joe's next challenger?
Plenty of players are right for the job and it would be the perfect opportunity to become apart of history overnight.
Joe Kelly's Destruction:
DODGEBALL 38: Defeated Sara DeCuir, 5-3
DODGEBALL 39: Defeated Ryan Letsche, 7-3
DODGEBALL XL: Defeated Travis Mills, 8-2
DODGEBALL 41: Who's Next?
*To be on the safe side, if Joe does not attend DODGEBALL 41, two new captains will be mutually agreed upon.*
As for DODGEBALL 42, a return "home" is in store for Sunday, June 4th, starting at 3pm. It will be the first Ocean Road Park event since DODGEBALL 38 and already, a surprise is in store. The "dice" return ...
For now, DODGEBALL 41 explodes at Wall High School starting at 6:30. After the minor controversy at the conclusion of DODGEBALL XL, some new rules to make the games go quicker could go in effect.
body_html:
It's about one man, Joe Kelly.

At DODGEBALL 38, Joe planted the seeds for what would the most awesome, the most destructive run in the history of dodgeball. His perfect record of 3-0 proves that when it comes time to forming an army, he does it better than anyone. There have certainly been other successful captains in the game of dodgeball, but no one has achieved a record of consecutive wins like Joe has.

This leaves a question unanswered: Who will be Joe's next challenger?

Plenty of players are right for the job and it would be the perfect opportunity to become apart of history overnight.

Joe Kelly's Destruction:
DODGEBALL 38: Defeated Sara DeCuir, 5-3
DODGEBALL 39: Defeated Ryan Letsche, 7-3
DODGEBALL XL: Defeated Travis Mills, 8-2

DODGEBALL 41: Who's Next?

*To be on the safe side, if Joe does not attend DODGEBALL 41, two new captains will be mutually agreed upon.*

As for DODGEBALL 42, a return "home" is in store for Sunday, June 4th, starting at 3pm. It will be the first Ocean Road Park event since DODGEBALL 38 and already, a surprise is in store. The "dice" return ...

For now, DODGEBALL 41 explodes at Wall High School starting at 6:30. After the minor controversy at the conclusion of DODGEBALL XL, some new rules to make the games go quicker could go in effect.
